data.oai_dc:dc: Microsatellite data used in the paper "Temporal relationship between genetic and warning signal variation in the aposematic wood tiger moth (Parasemia plantaginis)" by Galarza et al. The first line indicates the name of the microsatellite, with alleles coded in a two-coloumn format. Missing data is represented by "-9". Each line represents one sample's multilocus genotype starting with the sample name. The name is composed of the region, the colour morph (Y=yellow, W=white), and the year of collection (09=2009, 10=2010, 11=2011)
